shot.composition: POV gliding behind a deoxygenated red blood cell through the Vena Cava (large vein) on the return journey to the heart. 16:9.
shot.lens: Wide-angle macro lens, capturing the scale and majesty of the large vein.
shot.camera_movement: Slow, smooth, majestic gliding movement. Steady and calming tracking shot.

subject.description: Dark, deoxygenated red blood cells (deep burgundy/bluish tint) flowing smoothly in a wide, dense stream. The pace is slower and lower pressure than arteries.
subject.props: Carbon dioxide molecules faintly visible as dissolving particles.

scene.environment: A wide, majestic tunnel. Smoother walls than arteries, darker environment. Passing through delicate venous valves that prevent backflow.

visual_details.action: Smooth gliding flow back towards the heart. The journey feels relaxing yet epic, a grand return.
visual_details.special_effects: Subtle color grading to emphasize the bluish tint of venous blood. Detailed visualization of the venous valves opening and closing gently.
visual_details.negative_prompt_video: Fast movement, turbulence, bright red colors, narrow passage, arterial environment, blurry details, low resolution, black and white, grey tones, minimalism.

cinematography.lighting: Low-key lighting, darker atmosphere, subtle highlights on the vessel walls and the flowing cells. A sense of depth and tranquility.
cinematography.color_palette: Deep burgundy, dark reds, purples, subtle blue tint.
cinematography.tone: Relaxing, majestic, epic journey, tranquil, grand.

audio.music: Slow, grand orchestral score with a steady, flowing rhythm. Deep strings and low brass creating a sense of majesty and calm.
audio.ambient: Deep, slow rushing fluid sound. Distant, slow heartbeat.
audio.sound_effects: Gentle whooshing sounds. Soft sounds of the venous valves closing.
